subject: Sir,
body:
Sir,
YOUR CONTRACT PAYMENT FUND US$49,900,000.00 WAS APPROVED BY UNITED
NATION'S AND WORLD BANK OF SWITZERLAND.
Your urgent response to our message is well noted and also forwarded
to the Agents in PARIS FRANCE for update.
Based on our former message to you which we told you that your
PRESENCE must be needed in PARIS FRANCE,we would want to know when you
are proposing for the visit to PARIS FRANCE for your payment,Also let
us know if you would prefer Conformable BANK DRAFT OR CASH PAYMENT OR
BANK TO BANK payment upon your arrival to PARIS FRANCE?.
We will furnish you with the full details of the Paying office as soon
as we receive the above answer's from you, so you can open full
communication  with them and arrange for your visit.Also we shall scan
you the (ORIGIN OF FUND CERTIFICATE) which you will present to them
upon your arrival at their office which shall prove/stand you as the
real owner of the said funds US$49,900,000.00.
So if this new development suits you, go ahead and furnish us with the
below information before we shall send you the (ORIGIN OF FUND
CERTIFICATE).
1. YOUR FULL NAME/SURNAME.
2. YOUR COMPANY NAME AND ADDRESS IF ANY.
3. YOUR DIRECT TELEPHONE/FAX NUMBERS.
4. YOUR PERSONAL EMAIL ADDRESS
4. A COPY OF YOUR ID FOR IDENTIFICATION.
NOTE, YOUR PRESENT MUST BE NEEDED THERE IF YOU WISH TO RECEIVE YOUR PAYMENT.
Yours Faithfully.
ENGR.DENNIS BROWN.
SECRETARY FOR PUBLIC AFFAIRS.
UNITED KINGDOM,

subject: Re:    Sir,
body:
Dear Sir,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding my contract payment fund. I appreciate the update and the information you have provided. I understand that my presence is required in Paris, France for further proceedings.

I would like to know more about the options available for receiving the payment. Could you please provide me with additional details about the bank draft, cash payment, and bank-to-bank transfer? This will help me make an informed decision.

Furthermore, I would appreciate it if you could share the full details of the paying office in Paris once I confirm my preferred method of payment. It's important for me to have all the necessary information before proceeding.

In order to assist you better, please find below the requested details:

Full Name: 
Company Name (if applicable): 
Address: 
Direct Telephone Number: 
Fax Number (if applicable): 
Personal Email Address: 

I hope this information will be sufficient for now. However, I would like to clarify that due to personal reasons, I may not be able to travel immediately. Is there any flexibility regarding the timing of my visit to Paris?

Thank you once again for your assistance. I look forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Robert
